# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
on PowerShell 7-preview (x64), on Windows10
open powershell from start menu
open property dialog and change font
```

# Expected behavior

```none
font changed and the change is saved
```

# Actual behavior

```none
after a error dialog
the font is changed but not saved
```
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12258095/62183169-a44f5780-b38b-11e9-8e32-431eb03bc437.png)
